text: a friend's kickstarter for wireless headphones that also have 3d microphones has done astoundingly well, and they landed on Tech Crunch! <http://techcrunch.com/2014/10/29/bluetooth-headphones-hooke-have-3d-audio-recorders-built-in/>

attachments.title: Bluetooth Headphones Hooke Have 3D Audio Recorders Built-In
attachments.text: Hooke is a pair of Bluetooth headphones that also double as binaural, or 3D, recorders. The project is currently entering its final day on Kickstarter, having raised $154,000 over its $100,000 goal, and is scheduled to ship in June 2015.
attachments.fallback: TechCrunch Link: Bluetooth Headphones Hooke Have 3D Audio Recorders Built-In

text: (one more day in the KS campaign to get a pair at a 15% discount!)
